name: ASSETS LINE
description:
/ PLAY FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE /

---

It's your first day at your new position in the assets factory, and they put you in charge of the main assembly line. Your job is simple: keep an eye on the chunks being produce, and if you spot anything wrong... fix it!

Before you get to work, one piece of advice: It's pretty common for these neatly packed tiles to get mix up a little, but if you discover something that should not be there at all... you better put your employee manuals to good use!

---

INSTRUCTIONS

Use the mouse (left/right click) to change wrong tiles and create a continuous road.

Use the manuals at the borders of the screens (getting close with the cursor) to learn which sprites represent which tiles.

---

An experiment for the Kenney Jam 2019. I wanted to make a game where 3D and 2D assets could coexist and make sense together, and therefore "Unlikely Combinations".

Code by @galbix

Art/Assets by Kenney❤︎
